Info.Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Info.Writer: Lawrence Kasdan (screenplay by), George Lucas (story by), Philip Kaufman (story by)
Info.Actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman, Ronald Lacey
Info.Plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
Info.Language: English, German, Hebrew, Spanish, Arabic, Nepali
